name: Wild Fibers: Fever Battle
description:
A great army is chewing apart the forest!

A colony of killer insects came through the land, chasing any plants, fibers or flowers in its way!

With the help of multiple seeds your goal is to fight back the invasion and reclaim your home!

Wild Fibers: Fever Battle is a Tower Defense game where you can create and develop several groups of plants, each one with different abilities in order to destroy insects.

The development team is composed of: Valentin Dremaux drawing and designing and Gabriel Jouet programming, designing and drawing additional arts.

Tools used: Unity and Aseprite

Wild Box Studio
